name: spectral-thief
effect: Steals the target's stat increases, then inflicts regular damage.  Will not steal stat increases that would put any of the user's stats at more than +6; any excess is left on the target.  Stolen increases are affected by abilities as normal.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals
the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals
the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.

The user hides in the target’s shadow, steals
the target’s stat boosts, and then attacks.
